name: Manolo Local Market
description: This local market of manolo fortich, sells many food ingredients for lutong bahay or for the weather based foodie ingredients.

name: Sosana's Lutong Bahay
description: Eatery that offers delicious food and affordable from lutong bahay dish to a good food fits for everyday weathers

name: Pitongs Pares
description: Offers food good for everyday weather

name: Pa-paff
description: This offers foods good for hot/sunny and rainy weather. You can enjoy refreshing drinks, ramen, and delicious snacks.

name: Mama Cita's Cafe
description: This offers foods good for hot/sunny weather. You can enjoy refreshing drinks and delicious snacks.

name: Je's Tuna
description: This offers seafood-based meals, soups and affordable tuna dishes.

name: Mr. & Mrs. Wok
description: This offers wok-style meals and fast Asian cuisine, has a unique dishes with affordable prices mostly very instagrammable paradise.

name: Fil n Pak
description: This offers foods that best for a sunny and rainy weather, and if your feeling want to taste pakistani foods you should try this food chain.
